hero.headline: Transform Your Outdoor Space with Campos Landscaping
hero.subhead: Professional landscaping maintenance services tailored to your needs.

features.title: Lawn Care Experts
features.description: From mowing and fertilization to weed control, we'll keep your lawn healthy and vibrant.

features.title: Garden Maintenance
features.description: We offer comprehensive garden care services, including planting, pruning, and pest control.

features.title: Seasonal Clean-Up
features.description: Prepare your landscape for any season with our spring and fall clean-up services.

reviews.name: John S.
reviews.text: Campos Landscaping has transformed my yard! They are reliable, professional, and do excellent work.

reviews.name: Maria L.
reviews.text: I highly recommend Campos Landscaping for their attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction.
